title: Trump says he will release his 'perfect' MRI results
shortDescription: President Donald Trump had previously disclosed he underwent an MRI exam on Oct. 10, but he did not say which part of his body was scanned.

title: Senate to hold hearing on 'kill everybody' strike, Sen. Kelly says
shortDescription: Sen. Mark Kelly said the Armed Services Committee will put people connected to a strike on survivors of an attack on an alleged drug boat "under oath."

title: Tim Walz slams Trump's post on Somali community, use of slur
shortDescription: The Democratic governor and 2024 vice presidential hopeful said the president is "not a good human being" for use of a slur and other comments.

title: More Americans say Trump has raised prices: New poll
shortDescription: A Yahoo/YouGov poll found that 49% of respondents said Trump's actions since taking office in January have raised prices rather than lowering them.

title: Tennessee congressional race becomes unlikely test of blue wave
shortDescription: Tennessee's congressional District 7 special election has Democrats dreaming of an unexpected House pickup and Republicans worried about a disaster.

title: Trump tells airlines to avoid Venezuelan airspace
shortDescription: President Trump issued a warning to avoid Venezuelan airspace as his administration is ramping up strikes against drug trafficking organizations.

title: Trump warns against using Venezuelan airspace
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is ramping up a lethal campaign aimed at drug traffickers that observers say could topple Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro

title: Trump's approval rating hits second-term low in Gallup poll
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's approval rating has dropped to 36%, according to a new Gallup poll, the lowest mark of his second term.

title: Northwestern to pay $75m in deal with Trump admin to restore funding
shortDescription: The deal restores nearly $800 million in federal funding and puts an end to investigations over alleged civil rights violations and antisemitism.

title: Trump vows to scrap Biden’s executive orders signed by autopen
shortDescription: In a post to Truth Social, U.S. President Donald Trump said former president Joe Biden was ‘not involved’ in the autopen process and threatened to bring him up on ‘charges of perjury' if he says he was.

title: What 2026 means for 2028: Why JD Vance cares a lot about the midterms
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance has a midterm warning for Republicans: do a better job motivating voters who helped Trump take back the White House.

title: Indiana Republican senator says he's a no on redistricting after Trump uses slur
shortDescription: President Trump's "choices of words have consequences," wrote Indiana Sen. Mike Bohacek, whose daughter has Down syndrome.

title: Trump says Biden autopen actions are 'terminated.' Can he do that?
shortDescription: Biden has previously rejected Trump's assertions, as presidents have long used autopens.

title: Trump will pardon former Honduran president convicted on drug charges
shortDescription: The pardon announcement comes despite Trump making cracking down on illegal drug trafficking central to his second term.

title: Trump says land strikes in Venezuela will start
shortDescription: While addressing troops, President Donald Trump said the U.S. will start land strikes in Venezuela "very soon."

title: Military land strikes in Venezuela will 'start very soon,' Trump says
shortDescription: "We’ll be starting to stop them by land also," Trump said of Venezuelan drug traffickers. "The land is easier, but that’s going to start very soon."

title: Watch Trump call a reporter a 'stupid person' on Thanksgiving
shortDescription: Donald Trump was answering questions about the National Guard shooting in DC when CBS News' Nancy Cordes pressed him. He called her a "stupid person."

title: Trump orders green card review after DC shooting
shortDescription: A day after two National Guard members were shot near the White House, President Donald Trump announced a review of green card holders.

title: Trump calls reporter ‘stupid’ in heated exchange
shortDescription: Donald Trump called a reporter a “stupid person” after being asked about the suspect in the D.C. shootings.

title: Did President Donald Trump use a slur? See his Thanksgiving posts
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted a series of anti-immigration Thanksgiving messages on Truth Social. One of them contained the 'r word' slur. See posts.

title: Trump vows to halt migration from all 'Third World Countries'
shortDescription: President Trump said he will "permanently pause" migration from all "Third World Countries" following the shooting of National Guard troops in DC.
